short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put your knowledge to work. Anywhere on the web. Anytime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the companion chrome web extension for chatlyn AI. With this extension, it is possible to select text on websites and generate an answer based on the selected text automatically to the clipboard. Numerous chatlyn.ai assistants can be added in the configuration, and switched to at any time. 

Applications for this range from generating suggestions for an agent on reviews to the summarization of texts on guest's inquries; all in the browser without the necessity to switch between applications.

chatlyn AI is a chatbot AI that can be used together with chatlyn.com to connect to any messenger inbox provided.

Get more infos on chatlyn.com
